title: How can my neighbor listen in on my cell phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Your neighbor basically can’t. Encryption with cell phones has gotten pretty good. He could do a man-in-the-middle attack with a Stingray or the equivalent, but as far as is currently known, it would be difficult-to-impossible to actually listen in. See Stingray phone tracker - Wikipedia for more information on the closest he might come. Now if your neighbor were the NSA or CIA, or connected to the Chinese government, then I might be wrong; these entities probably have capabilities. But even for them, you’d have to be a pretty high priority target, which means a lot more than “my neighbor.”

It’s not that hard actually. https://www.techwalla.com/articles/how-to-use-a-cell-phone-as-a-listening-device How to listen to someone’s phone calls online for free?
